home.heroDescription: 1WaySEO combines the most advanced AI technologies including GPT, Claude, and Gemini to fully automate SEO content production from keyword research to article publishing.

features.keywordResearchDesc: AI automatically analyzes high-value keywords to find the best ranking opportunities
features.webResearchDesc: Automatically crawls and analyzes relevant web information to ensure content depth and accuracy
features.competitorAnalysisDesc: In-depth analysis of competitor content strategies to find differentiation advantages
features.structureGenerationDesc: Automatically determines optimal article length and structure based on keywords and search results
features.aiWritingDesc: Integrates all research data to generate high-quality SEO-optimized articles
features.imageGenerationDesc: AI automatically generates relevant images to enhance content visual appeal
features.linkOptimizationDesc: Smart suggestions for internal and external link strategies to improve site authority
features.aiSearchOptimizationDesc: Optimized for AI search engines to increase SGE exposure opportunities
features.autoPublishDesc: One-click WordPress publishing with scheduled automation

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Have Questions?
faq.description: Here are the most frequently asked questions

whatIsCredits.question: What are Credits?
whatIsCredits.answer: Credits are usage points for 1WaySEO, used to measure AI computation consumption. Generating one article requires approximately 3,000-5,000 Credits, depending on article length and the selected AI model.

creditsPerArticle.question: How many Credits does one article need?
creditsPerArticle.answer: A typical 2,000-word SEO article requires about 3,000-4,000 Credits, including keyword research, competitor analysis, article generation, and image generation. Longer articles (5,000+ words) may need 5,000-8,000 Credits.

lifetimePlan.question: Is the lifetime plan really permanent?
lifetimePlan.answer: Yes! After a one-time payment for the lifetime plan, you will permanently enjoy monthly auto-reset Credits quota. As long as 1WaySEO continues to operate, your plan remains valid forever.

creditsAccumulate.question: Do unused monthly credits accumulate?
creditsAccumulate.answer: Monthly quota resets automatically on the 1st of each month and does not carry over. However, Credit packages you purchase additionally are permanent and never expire.

getMoreCredits.question: How can I get more Credits?
getMoreCredits.answer: You can purchase Credit top-up packages anytime, which are added directly to your account balance. If you want more monthly quota, you can also purchase another lifetime plan - the new plan's monthly quota will stack with your existing quota.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods are supported?
paymentMethods.answer: We support credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, JCB), online ATM transfers, and other payment methods, securely processed through NewebPay.
